column3: 2 Peel-Peel 4 large garlic cloves
4 Take-Take 1 tomato
5 mince-mince the garlic
9 Chop-Chop tomato roughly (anysize chunks are fine
14 puree-puree tomatoes without any water in a blender/mixer
1 Heat-Heat 3 tbsp oil in a pan over medium heat
6 Add-1/2 tsp cumin seeds to the pan
3 Add-Add 1/4 tsp mustard to the pan
7 add-When mustard and cumin seeds begin to sizzle, add minced garlic
8 Lower-Lower the heat
10 Saute-Saute the garlic for 2-3 minutes
11 Add-Add 2 tbsp red chili powder to the pan
12 mix-mix well contents of the pan
15 Add-Add tomato puree to the pan
13 Add-1/2 tsp salt to the pan
16 Mix-Mix well tomato puree with contents in the pan
17 simmer-Allow the mixture to simmer over low heat for 5 minutes or until the mixture becomes thick
18 Take-Take the pan off the heat
19 Transfer-Transfer it to a serving bowl
